cause.description:
Create a world without genocide...one click at a time.
Through your contributions we can help end the cycle of genocide by recognizing all injustices both present and past.
1. Educate the public to raise awareness on the importance of recognizing genocide;
2. Work to stop the Genocide in Darfur; and
3. Empower our youth to take action!
cause.mission: Recognize the Armenian Genocide -- stop the genocide in Darfur
cause.name: End the Cycle of Genocide
